actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a demonstration project for construction of a highway between Buffalo, NY, and Princeton, W. Va.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a demonstration of a highway between Buffalo, New York, and Princeton, West Virginia. Directs that the Federal share of such project shall be 100 percent. Authorizes the appropriation of an amount not to exceed $90,000,000 for each of the fiscal years 1976 through 1986. Provides that such funds shall be taken from the Highway Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a demonstration project for construction of a highway between Buffalo, NY, and Princeton, W. Va.
